resources.string: Here is a link to my current location:
No apps available to share location with

kenkinder.com/gps-share/

Use to share your location how you want, whether it\'s SMS, Email, Twitter, or something else. Because this app uses no external services besides Google Maps, your privacy isn\'t a concern. This app is an Open Source application and has no advertising. Internet access is used only to download Google Maps tiles.
